resources.string: Are you Pregnant or just given birth ?
Do you have a serious heart condition ?
Do you have any iron problems ?
Did you travel overseas in the last 4 months ?
Are you less than 45 Kg in weight ?
Did you have fever in the past 3 weeks ?
Allow Application to access your location
A donor registeration form needs to be properly filled with all the particulars and correct address for fututre correspondence
A preliminary medical screening,including checking of blood haemoglobin level,weight,height, and BP will be carried out to assess your fitness for blood donation
A trained medical person will draw the blood using all aseptic and antiseptic measures
Light refreshment will be served after the donation.You should rest for about 10 to 15 minutes before leaving and read the post donation care leaflet carefully.
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data

\"Your blood is precious : Donate, save a life & make it Divine\"

If you like our services help us to do more by donating.

You can pay through Phone pay,Google Pay or Paytm

To this Contact :9010990285

Fratello InnoTech Pvt Ltd.,

Hyderabad

---OR---

Yes, or no.. You\\\'ll only know it when you take this test that depends on the requirements of donation to decide, and you\\\'ll know how can you be a blood donor. The test is based on the tests made by the american red cross and other blood donation organizations, so its result can be taken as a refrence

string.u: For direction click on direction icon at bottom
